rows.label: qst104505_msg0001
rows.name:
Hm? What is it? Ah, it's
about the Metal Brooches
I told the Nopon about.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0002
rows.name:
They often wash up on the
coast near here... where
you can see Triedge Isle.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0003
rows.name:
You see, you can use them as
the strongest piece in the
board game Duel Kingdom.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0004
rows.name:
However, that's a special
rule only for this base.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0005
rows.name:
As you can see, Temperantia has
no towns or villages, so there's
not much entertainment.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0006
rows.name:
The board game we brought with us
is our only form of amusement.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0007
rows.name:
But we get bored playing it over
and over, so we add new rules
to make it more interesting.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0008
rows.name:
If the Nopon started selling Metal
Brooches, everyone would probably
rush to buy them, but...

rows.label: qst104505_msg0009
rows.name:
...there are tough monsters on
the coast where they're found,
so I told the Nopon not to go.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0010
rows.name:
It would be a shame if they came
all this way just to get killed.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0011
rows.name:
You guys look like you can handle
yourselves. Try fetching some from
the coast of Triedge Isle.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0101
rows.name:
You can get Metal Brooches
at the nearby coast.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0102
rows.name:
It's the most sought-after
treasure among us right now.
If you're selling, we'll pay.
